thread.title: Excellent location and value for money!
thread.title_full: Excellent location and value for money! - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Manhattan/Fifth Avenue, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Audis88
title: Excellent location and value for money!
text:
Stayed here for 5 nights. The hotel has an excellent location close to 5th avenue and Times square. 10 minutes walk (fast) to Central Park. The hotel is situated close to the subway, which also makes it a great place to stay for exploring the city as a first-timer! Breakfast is decent and included in the price.
Will definitely consider staying at this hotel again.
